Title: Unjust enrichment and the Brussels I regulation
Abstract: © The Author (2019). Published by Cambridge University Press for the British Institute of International and Comparative Law.This article examines how the jurisdictional rules of the recast of the Brussels I Regulation, namely the rules of exclusive jurisdiction for immovable property and company law and governance matters and the rules of special jurisdiction for contracts and torts, deal with unjust enrichment claims and issues concerning unjust enrichment. It also asks whether a new special jurisdiction rule for unjust enrichment should be added to the Regulation.
